verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Bildad|strong="H1085"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Shuhite|strong="H7747"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*:

“\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w go|strong="H6310"\w* \w on|strong="H6310"\w* \w saying|strong="H6310"\w* such things? \w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* blustering \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*.

Does God \w pervert|strong="H5791"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*? Does \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w pervert|strong="H5791"\w* \w what|strong="H6664"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*?

\w When|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w Him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w gave|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w rebellion|strong="H6588"\w*.

But \w if|strong="H2603"\w* \w you|strong="H7836"\w* \w would|strong="H7706"\w* \w earnestly|strong="H7836"\w* \w seek|strong="H7836"\w* God \w and|strong="H2603"\w* ask \w the|strong="H2603"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w for|strong="H7836"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w*,

\w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3477"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* \w rouse|strong="H5782"\w* \w Himself|strong="H7999"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \w estate|strong="H5116"\w*.
Though \w your|strong="H1961"\w* beginnings \w were|strong="H1961"\w* modest, \w your|strong="H1961"\w* latter days \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w flourish|strong="H7685"\w*.

\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w inquire|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H7592"\w* \w past|strong="H7223"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w and|strong="H7223"\w* \w consider|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* discoveries \w of|strong="H7592"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* fathers.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w born|strong="H3808"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*; \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H3318"\w* tell \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w speak|strong="H4405"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*?

\w Does|strong="H3808"\w* \w papyrus|strong="H1573"\w* \w grow|strong="H7685"\w* \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H1097"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w marsh|strong="H1207"\w*? Do reeds \w flourish|strong="H7685"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*?

\w While|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* shoots \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* uncut, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* quickly \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*.

\w Such|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* destiny \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* God; \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w godless|strong="H2611"\w* \w will|strong="H3605"\w* perish.

His \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* fragile; his \w security|strong="H4009"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spider’s \w web|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1004"\w* \w leans|strong="H8172"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w web|strong="H1004"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w gives|strong="H5975"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w*; \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w holds|strong="H2388"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w endure|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* well-watered \w plant|strong="H8121"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sunshine, spreading \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w shoots|strong="H3127"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w garden|strong="H1593"\w*.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* \w wrap|strong="H5440"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rock|strong="H1530"\w* \w heap|strong="H1530"\w*; \w he|strong="H1004"\w* looks \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* stones.

\w If|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4725"\w* uprooted \w from|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* disown \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, saying, ‘\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.’

\w Surely|strong="H2005"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; yet others \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w spring|strong="H6779"\w* \w from|strong="H4885"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reject|strong="H3988"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w blameless|strong="H8535"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w joy|strong="H8643"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H8130"\w* \w enemies|strong="H8130"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H3847"\w* \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*, \w and|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H8130"\w* tent \w of|strong="H1322"\w* \w the|strong="H8130"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w no|strong="H7563"\w* \w more|strong="H7563"\w*.”
